devdoc.details: Provides LTV queries and position data for ADL and frontend Sub-Account Model:   - Each user has 256 possible sub-accounts (index 0-255)   - Sub-account address = (userAddress & 0xFF...FF00) | subAccountIndex   - Each sub-account can have at most 1 controller (debt) + N collaterals

returns._0: Array of collateral vault addresses with configured LTVs

getAssetPrice(address,address).details: Returns the value of 1 whole unit of token

params.vault: The vault to query (determines oracle and unit of account)

returns.price: Price in unit of account decimals

getBorrowLtvBps(address).details: Returns the minimum borrow LTV across all enabled collaterals

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

returns._0: Minimum borrow LTV in basis points

params.collateralVault: The vault where collateral is deposited

returns.borrowLTV: The borrow LTV in basis points
returns.liquidationLTV: The liquidation LTV in basis points

getCollateralToDebtRate(address,address).details: Useful for ADL: how many debt tokens per collateral token

getCurrentLtvBps(address,address,uint8).details: Uses accountLiquidityFull to properly handle multi-collateral positions

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

getCurrentLtvBpsSimple(address,address,u.details: Alias for getCurrentLtvBps (both now use the same accurate calculation)

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt
The vault where the user has debt

getExchangeRate(address,address,address).details: Returns how many quote tokens you get for 1 whole unit of base token

params.vault: Any vault that has the oracle configured

returns.rate: Exchange rate scaled by quoteToken decimals

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

returns._0: Health factor in 1e18 scale (1e18 = 1.0, max = no debt)

getLiquidationLtvBps(address).details: Returns the minimum LLTV across all enabled collaterals

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

returns._0: Minimum liquidation threshold in basis points
The main sub-account address and its index

getSubAccount(address,uint8).details: Sub-account = (user & 0xFF...FF00) | subAccountIndex      The user's "main" account has index = last byte of their address.

getUserAccountData(address,address,uint8.details: Used by ADL/AL triggers to calculate position values

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

returns.totalCollateralUsd: Total collateral value in 8 decimals USD
returns.totalDebtUsd: Total debt value in 8 decimals USD

params.borrowVault: The vault where the user has debt

returns._0: True if position is healthy (or no position)

devdoc.title: EulerGatewayView

getAcceptedCollaterals(address).notice: Get list of accepted collaterals for a borrow vault

getAssetPrice(address,address).notice: Get price of a token in the vault's unit of account

getBorrowLtvBps(address).notice: Returns the borrow LTV limit in basis points

getCollateralBalance(address,address,uin.notice: Get collateral balance for a sub-account in a specific vault

getCollateralLtv(address,address).notice: Get LTV configuration for a specific collateral

getCollateralToDebtRate(address,address).notice: Get exchange rate between collateral and debt token for a position

getCurrentLtvBps(address,address,uint8).notice: Returns the current LTV (debt/collateral) in basis points

getCurrentLtvBpsSimple(address,address,u.notice: Returns the current LTV using raw collateral/liability values

getDebtBalance(address,address,uint8).notice: Get debt balance for a sub-account

getExchangeRate(address,address,address).notice: Get exchange rate between two tokens via vault's oracle

getLiquidationLtvBps(address).notice: Returns the liquidation LTV threshold in basis points

getMainSubAccount(address).notice: Get the user's "main" sub-account (index matches last byte of address)

getSubAccount(address,uint8).notice: Get sub-account address from user and index

getUserAccountData(address,address,uint8.notice: Get total collateral and debt values in USD (8 decimals)

isHealthy(address,address,uint8).notice: Check if a position is healthy (not liquidatable)

userdoc.notice: Read-only gateway for Euler V2 lending protocol
